tool_description: 1800+ captions for your Instagram posts or stories!
title: Instagram Captions

api_list.name: Get Captions by Word Search
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a list of captions that include the word from the request.

api_list.name: Get Random Caption
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a random caption out of all the available ones
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-captions.p.rapidapi.com/captions/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-captions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Captions
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the captions available in alphabetical order.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-captions.p.rapidapi.com/captions"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-captions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
